Package com.example.push_app.handlers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppStatus
    Class that holds information about app status.
    AuthorizationHandler
    Handles user authorization.
    DatabaseHandler
    Static class used to handle database calls.
    FCMHandler
    HaProvides functionality to refresh Firebase Cloud Messaging Token.
    HashString
    Class used to calculate MD5 hash
    MyFirebaseMessagingService
    NOTE: There can only be one service in each app that receives FCM messages.
    SettingsPopDelete
    Displays pop up window informing user that his data will be permanently deleted.
    Toaster
    Simple static class that provides an ability to make toast message that doesn't have to be executed o a main thread.
